title: Flights & Flatbread with PEJU Winery
description:
Join us on Tuesday, June 25, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for a special Flights & Flatbread event featuring the elegant, small-lot wines of PEJU Winery, hosted by National Sales Director Chris Arno. Enjoy a delicious flatbread alongside a tasting flight of three wines from PEJU's Legacy Collection.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Includes a flatbread and tasting of three wines)

Featured Wines (3 poured):

• Peju Legacy Collection Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Complex and layered with dried red fruit, cigar box, wet stone, and a cocoa-dusted finish balanced by firm structure.

• Peju Legacy Collection Chardonnay 2023 – 90 pts, Robert Parker. Bright and refreshing with notes of crème brûlée, lemon, and subtle white peach.

• Peju Legacy Collection Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – Lively and expressive with tropical fruit aromas, crisp grapefruit, key lime, and a zesty, clean finish.

Taste the heart of Napa Valley with a family-owned winery that has remained committed to quality for over 40 years—an evening of great wine, great food, and great company.
